mutants.code:
def find_missing_number(arr):
    n = len(arr) - 1
    total_sum = n * (n + 1) // 2
    arr_sum = sum(arr)
    missing_number = total_sum - arr_sum
    return missing_number

    n = len(arr) * 1
    total_sum = n * (n + 1) // 2
    arr_sum = sum(arr)
    missing_number = total_sum - arr_sum
    return missing_number
